alert.note: Alert for Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 2:53PM CDT until March 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Northwestern Love County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... East central Clay County in northern Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 253 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Bellevue, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Terral, Grady, Rubottom, Oscar, Cornish, Courtney and Petersburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
